dict.acceptation: 在这里；这时；在这一点上；（给某人东西或指出某物时说）；

sent.orig: In ` I wish you were here', ` were' is in the subjunctive.
sent.trans: 在I wish you were here一句中， were表达的是虚拟语气。

sent.orig: We'll plant automated sensors here, here, and here, and rig them through a central relay here.
sent.trans: 我们把自动化的传感器安置在这儿，这儿和这儿，在这儿安装上中心继电器。

sent.orig: I work here; turn here; radio waves received here on Earth.
sent.trans: 我在这儿工作；转过来；这儿总会接受到无线电波的。

sent.orig: You can't be here, why you are here. You are not alow to get in here.
sent.trans: 这里的老师都是变态吗，就算看不清楚我的实力也不应该这样耍我。

sent.orig: Look here, and also here and here.
